long_description: The Thule Chinook Bike Trailer Kit converts your Thule Chariot Chinook 1 or Chinook 2 (sold separately) into a deluxe bicycle trailer. Patented ezHitch(TM) makes for fast and easy installation. Industry approved safety features. Includes an aluminum arm, axle-mount ezHitch, quick-release skewer, hitch cup, safety flag, reflector kit, backup strap, protection sleeve and light-attachment bracket.
short_description: The Thule Chinook Bike Trailer Kit converts your Thule Chariot Chinook 1 or Chinook 2 (sold separately) into a deluxe bicycle trailer.
